sentences.en: A life of dullness , of drab, unvarying monotony.
sentences.cn: 平凡的, 永远是如此平凡的.

sentences.en: A night on the town may help to break the monotony of the week.
sentences.cn: 进城住一晚或许有助于消除一周生活的单调。

sentences.en: But the days succeeded each other with despairing monotony.
sentences.cn: 一天一天就这样枯燥无味地过去了.

sentences.en: Further on, the wood of Ficuzza broke the savage monotony of arable plain.
sentences.cn: 远处有一片“翡古萨”森林, 这才打破了尽是农田所造成的极单调的气氛.

sentences.en: Her head ached as she looked forward to the dull monotony of life.
sentences.cn: 当她展望自己一生的枯寂时,她感到头疼.

sentences.en: I hate the monotony of work on the assembly line.
sentences.cn: 我痛恨在单调无味的流水装配线上工作.

sentences.en: She watches television to relieve the monotony of everyday life.
sentences.cn: 她天天靠看电视来解闷儿。

sentences.en: Slip - shod girls cleaning the windows of the little shops broke the monotony of the street.
sentences.cn: 衣衫不整的女孩子在揩抹小店铺的橱窗,这打破了街头的单调.

sentences.en: That affair was a sauce to the monotony of rural life.
sentences.cn: 那件事给单调的乡村生活增添了乐趣.

sentences.en: The cheerless monotony was sometimes enlivened with a little innocent merriment.
sentences.cn: 有时候,一点儿天真的嬉戏会使阴郁单调的生活增添一点生气.

sentences.en: The monotony of the ranch eat into her heart hour by hour , year by year.
sentences.cn: 单调的农庄生活一天天 、 一年年的咬啮着她的心.

sentences.en: The monotony should be relieved by more generous leave being granted both to officers and men.
sentences.cn: 对于生活的单调,应该用给官兵的更多的假期的方法来加以调剂.

sentences.en: The rooms are admirably cool and shady after the hot brown monotony of the countryside.
sentences.cn: 在乡间经受过持续的暴晒后，房间里显得特别阴凉宜人。

sentences.en: The warmth of the room and the monotony of the speaker's voice grew soporific.
sentences.cn: 房间里的热气和发言人单调的声音让人昏昏欲睡。

sentences.en: They broke the monotony of the weary journey with songs and jokes.
sentences.cn: 他们唱歌或说笑话使这个令人疲惫的旅程不至于单调乏味.

words.tran_cn: 单调的；无变化的；产生单音调的
单调的，无抑扬顿挫的；无变化的

trans.tran_en: the quality of being always the same, which makes something boring, especially someone’s life or work
